      • parseConnectionConfig

        protected org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanDefinition parseConnectionConfig(Element element)
        Creates a connection config. If a bindDn and bindCredential are present, a BindConnectionInitializer is inserted into the connection config.
        Parameters:
        element - containing configuration
        Returns:
        connection config bean definition
